entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Beauceville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:15 PM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023
